DOC.brief_summary: To investigate effect food healthy male volunteer receive HCP1201 tablet feed versus fast condition
DOC.brief_title: Single-dose , 2-way Crossover Open Study Evaluate Food Effect PK HCP1201 Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: An open-label , randomize , single-dose crossover study evaluate effect food pharmacokinetics HCP1201 tablet healthy volunteer
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy male volunteer , age 20~55 year 2 . The result Body Mass Index ( BMI ) less 19 kg/m2 , 27 kg/m2 3 . Subject ability comprehend study objective , content property study drug participate trial 4 . Subject ability willingness participate whole period trial 1 . Presence medical history concurrent disease may interfere treatment safety assessment completion clinical study , include clinically significant disorder kidney , liver , cardiovascular system , respiratory system , endocrine system , neuropsychiatric system . 2 . Glomerular filtration rate 60ml/min calculate serum creatinine value . 3 . Liver enzyme ( AST , ALT ) level exceeds maximum normal range one half time . 4 . Systolic Blood Pressure : low 90mmHg high 150mmHg , Diastolic Blood Pressure : low 60mmHg high 100mmHg 5 . History relevant drug allergy clinically significant hypersensitivity reaction . 6 . History drug abuse positive drug screening . 7 . Participation drug study within 60days prior drug administration . 8 . Whole blood donation within 60 day , blood component donation within 30 day get transfusion within 30days . 9 . Subjects take prescription drug within 14 day patient screen nonprescription medicine within 7 day affect result clinical trial ( acceptable accord investigator 's judgement ) 10 . Subjects take medicine ( e.g . proton pump inhibitor , rifampicin , oriental medicine , etc . ) within 30days affect absorption , distribution , metabolism , elimination metformin/rosuvastatin . 11 . Intake 140g alcohol per week ca n't abstain alcohol trial . 12 . Subjects smoke 10 cigarette per day ca n't quit smoke trial . 13 . Positive screening Hepatitis B surface antigen ( HBsAg ) , antiHepatitis C virus ( HCV ) antiHuman immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) . 14 . Genetic myopathic disorder relate family history , medical history myopathic disorder cause medication . 15 . Clinically inappropriate laboratory test result . 16 . Clinically inappropriate electrocardiogram result . 17 . Subjects judge ineligible investigator .
